title: 2 Bd/2 Bth- Bright and Peaceful Ready Now. A Real Must See!
map_address: 141 Golf Club Road near Contra Costa Blvd.
posting_body: 141 Golf Club Road, Pleasant Hill, CA 94523
Welcome to Briarwood Apartments, located in Pleasant Hill.
Featuring a spacious, updated 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath on the top floor with ultimate comfort and privacy.
Here you are surrounded by views of large redwood trees, lush landscaping and a peaceful community in a park-like setting.

We are located in a perfect area in Pleasant Hill that is within walking distance to shopping, dining and entertainment and easy, quick access to HWY 680 and Pleasant Hill and Concord BART just moments away.
A/C Transit is a 1 minute walk to get anywhere in the Bay Area and beyond!
Beautifully and Newly Updated 2 Bedroom, 2 bath, 880 Sq.
•	Resident pays water/trash/sewer with small fee based on occupancy
•	Large storage closets on patio and balconies
•	Pet friendly – Breed and weight restrictions apply
•	Sparkling swimming pool and sun deck
•	Beautifully landscaped open grass area with gazebo
•	Large redwood trees and lush landscaping
•	Friendly and responsive onsite Management and Maintenance

•	Ideally located near shopping including Safeway, Trader Joes, Whole Foods, Nordstrom Rack, Target, Sunvalley Mall, The Veranda, which includes IMAX Theater, TJ Maxx, The Gap and many restaurants including, Yard House, Mikuni Sushi, Puesto, MOD Pizza, Super Duper Burgers, Nick the Greek, Residual Sugar and Wine Bar and Dave and Busters, and many more!
•	Close to Schools – DVC, College Park High, Valley View Middle, Gregory Gardens Elementary, JFK University, CAL State University East Bay.
•	Short Drive to BART (Pleasant Hill and Concord stations)
•	A/C Transit (Get anywhere in the Bay Area, short walk to the main hub)
FRIENDLY OFFICE STAFF ARE WAITING TO GIVE YOU A TOUR OF YOUR NEXT HOME!
Monday to Friday – 9:00 am to 6:00 pm
